name: Doc Hunt
description:
My contribution to the FZ Game Jam 2021

Doc Hunt

A reclusive man lives alone in his cabin far away from society. Stuck in the past, he hates modern technology. His sworn enemy is Dr Inet, a crazy inventor who floods the world with new phones, computers and big screen TVs. God knows it’s too affordable for the general public to resist. 

It is time to go doc hunting.

Play using the mouse.

Click the map to start the hunt.
